mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (userId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardcategoryId) VALUES (#{ userId }, #{ boardTitle }, #{ boardContent }, #{ boardcategoryId })
INSERT INTO productreview (boardNo, prodNo) VALUES (#{ boardNo }, #{ prodNo })
INSERT INTO boardattach (boardNo, userfilename, savedfilename) VALUES (#{ boardNo }, #{ userfilename }, #{ savedfilename })
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardno, b.userid, b.boardtitle, b.boarddate, b.boardmodifydate, b.boardcontent, p.prodname FROM board b LEFT JOIN productreview pr ON pr.boardno = b.boardno LEFT JOIN product p ON p.prodno = pr.prodno WHERE boardcategoryid = 1 AND b.boarddelete = false ORDER BY boardno DESC LIMIT #{ start }, #{ count }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM productreview pr LEFT JOIN board b ON b.boardno = pr.boardno LEFT JOIN product p ON p.prodno = pr.prodno WHERE b.boardcategoryid = 1 AND b.boarddelete = false ORDER BY b.boardno DESC
SELECT p.* FROM product p WHERE prodactive = false ORDER BY prodno DESC

SELECT b.boardno, b.userid, b.boardtitle, b.boarddate, b.boardmodifydate, b.boardcontent, p.prodname FROM productreview pr LEFT JOIN board b ON b.boardno = pr.boardno LEFT JOIN product p ON p.prodno = pr.prodno WHERE boardcategoryid = 1 AND b.boardno = #{ boardNo } ORDER BY boardno DESC
SELECT fileno, boardno, userfilename, savedfilename " + "FROM boardattach " WHERE fileno = #{ attachNo }
